description:
XTG Technology 3 AC + 2 USB Wall Plate and Slim Surge ProtectorThe Slim 
Wall Plate Surge Protectoris perfect for home, office or a professional workstation.This surge protector acts as a power strip as it powers up to five electrical devices with the three Outlets and two USB Charging Ports.This Adds 
Additional Outlets and USB Ports While Also Protecting Your DevicesTechnical Specifications:Slim wall plate surge protector 540 Joules3 AC outlets2 USB Charging Ports36000 Amps2.1 amp USB output for iPad, iPhone, E-readers, Android, SmartPhones, Tablets and MoreFireproof circuitryUL safety approval gauranteed to 
keep your electronics safeLED indicatorProtect from surges, voltage fluctuations and spikes that can damage your devicesKeep your computer, tablet, printer, hard drives, modems, and other equipment safe from damage, data loss, corruption, and system crashes.Wall-mountable Surge Protector is Ideal for protecting small home electronics(Note: Not compatible with select Blackberry models 9900/9700)
title: Slim Wall Plate and Surge Protector - 3 AC + 2 USB - Add Additional Outlets and USB Ports While Protecting Your Devices - USB Includes 2.1amp Output to Charge iPad, iPhone, E-readers, Android, SmartPhones, and More
